info.title: Apigee Edge API
info.description: RESTful management API to create, configure, and manage API proxies and API products, create and manage apps and app developers, and more.

post.description: Creates an organization.

get.description: Lists all the organizations.
Gets a specific organization.

put.description: Updates the description of a specific organization.

delete.description: Deletes a specific organization.

get.description: Gets all deployments of an organization.
Gets all the pods associated with an organization.

post.description: Disassociates a pod from an organization.
Creates an environment.

get.description: Lists all the environments in an organization.
Gets details for an environment.

post.description: Updates an environment.

delete.description: Deletes a specific environment in an organization.

get.description: Gets the deployments for an environment in an organization.
Gets the deployments for an API Proxy in the given environment in an organization.
Gets the deployments for an API Proxyâ€™s revision for an environment in an organization.

post.description: Add servers into the environment.

delete.description: Deletes servers from the environment.

get.description: Gets the servers that are bound to an environment.

post.description: Creates a virtual host.

get.description: Lists all virtual hosts in an environment.
Gets details for a named virtual host .

post.description: Updates a specific virtual host in an environment.

delete.description: Deletes a specific virtual host in an environment.

parameters.name: revision_number
parameters.description: Mention the API Proxy revision number

post.description: Undeploys an API proxy revision from an environment.

get.description: Gets all APIs in an organization.

post.description: Uploads a ZIP-formatted API proxy configuration bundle from a local machine to an organization on the API Platform.

get.description: Gets an API proxy by name, providing a list of existing revisions of the API proxy configuration.

delete.description: Deletes an API and all associated endpoints, policies, resources, and revisions.

put.description: Use the POST method to update a specific API proxy in an organization.

delete.description: Deletes a specific revision of an API.

get.description: Exports an API from Apigee to the local machine a ZIP bundle of config and code files..
Returns detail on deployments of the API specified.
Get deployments for a revision of an API proxy.

post.description: Create an API product: a list of API resources combined with Quota settings that you can use to deliver customized API bundles to your developers.

get.description: Lists all API products by name for an organization.
Gets the list of keys/apps/developers for an API product of an organization.

put.description: This method updates an existing API product.

delete.description: Deletes an API product.

post.description: Create a developer in an organization .

get.description: Gets the developer profile by registered date.
Get a count of apps by developer email address.

post.description: Sets the status of a developer.

put.description: Update an existing developer profile with new values or additional attributes.

delete.description: Deletes a developer from an Organization.

post.description: Creates an app associated with a developer.

get.description: Provides an expanded view of a developer's collection of apps .

put.description: Updates the app to get a new set of consumer credentials.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: Specify the entity as API resources.

get.description: Gets a count of all API resources in the API products accessible by a developer app .

post.description: Revokes a Developer App, disabling access to all API Products .

delete.description: Delete a Developer's App.

post.description: Revokes a developer app key.

get.description: Returns details for a consumer key for a developer app .

delete.description: Deletes a consumer key that belongs to an app.

post.description: Revokes the association of an API Product with a Developer App's consumer key.

delete.description: Removes an API product from a developer app key profile, and thereby renders the developer app unable to access the URIs defined in the API product specified.

get.description: Get count of OAuth 1.0 access tokens for a developer's app.
Get count of  OAuth 2.0 access tokens for a developer's app.
Get count of OAuth 1.0 access tokens for a developer's app key.
Get count of OAuth 2.0 access tokens for a developer's app key.
Gets the Oauth 1.0 a request token for the speficied consumer key.

post.description: Revokes an OAuth 1.0 a request token.

delete.description: Deletes the request token specified.

get.description: Returns list of all OAuth 1.0a request.
Gets the detail of given verifier code.

delete.description: Deletes the specified verifier code, which is the verifier code given by the provider.

get.description: Gets a list of all verifiers and details for each verifier in an Organization.
Fetches the details of given access token.

post.description: Revokes the specified access token.

delete.description: Deletes the specified access token.

get.description: Returns a count of all 1.0a access tokens in an orgnization .
Get a specific Authorization Code.

delete.description: Deletes the given authorization Code.

get.description: Lists all authorization codes in an organization.
Gets details of a specific access token.

post.description: Revokes a specific access token.

delete.description: Deletes a specific access token.

get.description: Get count of OAuth 2.0 access tokens under an organization .

post.description: Creates a KeyValueMap.

get.description: Returns an expanded view of all Maps scoped by organization, environment or API.
Gets a specific entry details.

delete.description: Deletes a single entry by name.

get.description: Gets a KeyValueMap by name, along with associated entries.

delete.description: Deletes a KeyValueMap and all associated entries.

get.description: Lists and expands audit records for management operations against APIs, API revisions and policies.

post.description: Creates a company in an organization.

get.description: Returns an expanded list of companies, displaying a full profile for each company in the organization.
Gets details for a Company.

delete.description: Deletes an existing Company.

post.description: Adds a developer to a company.

get.description: Lists all developers associated with a company.

delete.description: Removes the association of a Developer with a Company.

post.description: Creates an app for a company.

get.description: Gets an expanded list company apps .

post.description: Updates an existing company app.

get.description: Gets the count  of API resources for a company app.

delete.description: Deletes a company app.

post.description: Revokes the specific key of a company app.

get.description: Gets the consumer key issued to a company app.

delete.description: Deletes a company app key.

post.description: Creates an app family.

get.description: An expanded list of all app families in an organization, listing Apps in the collection.

post.description: Updates an existing app family.

get.description: Gets a list of apps in an appfamily.

delete.description: Deletes an App Family and all Apps it contains.
Removes an App from an App Family.

post.description: Creates an app family for developers.

get.description: An expanded list of all app families in an organization, listing Apps in the collection

post.description: Updates an existing app family.

get.description: Gets a list of apps in an appfamily.

delete.description: Deletes an App Family and all Apps it contains.
Removes an App from an App Family.

post.description: Creates a role in an organization.

get.description: Gets a list of roles available to users in an organization.
Gets a role.

delete.description: Deletes a role from an organization.

post.description: Creates a user.

get.description: Gets a list of users.

post.description: Updates a user.

get.description: Gets a user.

delete.description: Deletes a user.

post.description: Creates a role at global level.

get.description: Gets a list of roles available to users.
Gets a role.

delete.description: Deletes a role.

post.description: Associates a user with a organizational user role.

get.description: Gets roles for a user.

post.description: Adds user to role.

get.description: Lists users for a role.
Checks user in a given system role

delete.description: Deletes user for a role.
Deletes organizational role for a user.

post.description: Creates a resource.

get.description: Gets a RBAC resource based on resource path.

delete.description: Deletes a resource.

post.description: Creates a global level resource.

get.description: Gets a specific resource.

delete.description: Deletes a specific resource.

post.description: Associates permissions for a resource with a user role.

get.description: Gets a list of permissions associated with the specified resource for a single resource.
Checks the particular userrole permission of a resource at organization level.

delete.description: Deletes particular userrole permission at organization level.

post.description: Adds multiple resource permissions for resource at organization level.
Adds permissions for resource at global level.

get.description: Gets permission for a specific resource at global level.
Checks particular userrole permission for a resource at global level.

delete.description: Deletes particular userrole permission for a resource at global level

post.description: Adds multiple resource permissions for resource at global level.

get.description: Gets permissions for a user at global level
Checks user has particular permission for a resource at global level

info.title: Apigee Edge API
info.description: RESTful management API to create, configure, and manage API proxies and API products, create and manage apps and app developers, and more.
